title: docker hub lastest old
body_html:
The readme suggests using

nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch/pytorch:latest

However doing so provides quite an old version of pytorch.

In [1]: import torch
In [2]: torch.version

Out[2]: '0.2.0_2'

Perhaps a new version should be built, a warning should be offered or the suggestion should be removed.

body:
The readme suggests using 

nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch/pytorch:latest

However doing so provides quite an old version of pytorch.

In [1]: import torch
In [2]: torch.__version__

Out[2]: '0.2.0_2'

Perhaps a new version should be built, a warning should be offered or the suggestion should be removed.
